So, does anyone know how to update a pro app that is installed through apk (like the ones in this torrent). Because you arn't able to update them through the market. Your phone doesn't register these apps in the 'download' section of the android market.
i doubt these can be updated via the market w/o paying for them. you may need to find the new version in a torrent.
what to do with .apk files? Do I just put them on my memorycard or what?
Put them  on the sd card of your phone then run them from your phone with a file manager (for instance Astro)

How to install an app with the .apk file extension: 1) Go to settings > applications, and enable the \'unknown sources\' option. 2) put the .apk somewhere on your sd card. 3) Open your file manager on the device (there are a shitload of emm on the market for free). 4) click on the apk file. 5) if you get the \'complete action using\' pop-up, choose \'package installer\'
